column5: Wonderful craftsman home located in historic district of Grapevine, TX. Home is beautifully decorated with all modern amenities. Outdoor covered patio with outdoor kitchen, grill and beer garden. Short walk to Main Street and Grapevine Brewery. Ideally located approximately 25 miles from downtown Dallas as well as Ft. Worth. Also approx. 18 miles from Cowboys AT&T Stadium and Rangers Globelife Ballpark in Arlington. Ten wineries and Lake Grapevine all within a short drive.
column8: Cantu Place, blocks from historic Main Street
